categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This unidentified Jedi was the master to Padawan Arn Peralun during the renewed conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. This Jedi was slain on Dakot Seven while he and his apprentice were escorting refugees to save them from slavers; he was killed when incoming fire rained upon himself and his Padawan.
His apprentice Peralun was struck and suffered serious injuries resulting in him receiving several prosthetics.
